search.query: index="$traceIndex$" sourcetype="httpevent" | rex field=service.name "(?<service_name>.*)" | search service_name="$serviceName$" | rex field=start_time "(?<start_time>\d+)" | rex field=end_time "(?<end_time>\d+)" | eval start_time=start_time/1000000000 | eval end_time=end_time/1000000000 | eval _time=start_time | eval spanStartTime=strftime(start_time, "%Y-%m-%d %H:%M:%S.%6N") | eval spanEndTime=strftime(end_time, "%Y-%m-%d %H:%M:%S.%6N") | eval duration=(end_time-start_time)*1000 | sort 0 _time | eval spanLatency=case(duration>=$latencyPoor$, "1", duration>=$latencyWarn$, "2", true(), "3") | sort 0 spanLatency _time | stats min(spanLatency) as spanLatency by trace_id | eval spanLatency=case(spanLatency=1, "poor", spanLatency=2, "warning", true(), "good")
| eventcount summarize=false index=* | dedup index | fields index

input.label: Please search traces by time period

chart.title: average (10s) requests over time by service

search.query: index="$traceIndex$" sourcetype="httpevent" | rename "service.name" as service_name | rename name as spanName | rename trace_id as traceID | rex field=start_time "(?<start_time>\d+)" | eval start_time=start_time/1000000000 | rex field=spanName "(?<traceError>(?i)error)" | eval traceError=if(!isnull(traceError), 1, 2) | stats min(start_time) as _time, min(traceError) as traceError, values(spanName) as spanName by traceID, service_name | eval traceStatus=if(traceError<2, "request - error", "request - good") | table _time traceID traceStatus service_name | eval requestGood = if(traceStatus="request - good", 1/10, 0) | eval requestError = if(traceStatus="request - error", 1/10, 0) | eval Total=requestError + requestGood | timechart span=10s useother=f limit=0 usenull=f sum(requestGood) as "request - good" sum(requestError) as "request - error" sum(Total) as TOTAL by service_name

index="$traceIndex$" sourcetype="httpevent" | rename "service.name" as service_name | rex field=start_time "(?<start_time>\d+)" | rex field=end_time "(?<end_time>\d+)" | eval start_time=start_time/1000000000 | eval end_time=end_time/1000000000 | eval _time=start_time
| eval duration=(end_time-start_time)*1000 | sort 0 _time
| timechart span=10s perc50(duration) as p50 perc90(duration) as p90 perc99(duration) as p99 by service_name

index="$traceIndex$" sourcetype="httpevent" | addinfo | eval duration=round(info_max_time-info_min_time,0) | eval esize=len(_raw) | rex field=service.name "(?<serviceName>.*)" | eval serviceData = serviceName | table duration esize serviceName serviceData | stats count as count avg(esize) as avg avg(duration) as duration by serviceData | eval bytes=((count*avg)/duration)*(60*60*24) | eval gb=bytes/1024/1024/1024 | fields - bytes count avg service.name extracted_sourcetype serviceName duration
index="$traceIndex$" sourcetype="httpevent" | stats count by "service.name" | rename "service.name" as serviceName

| stats count | eval spanLatency="*", traceError="*" | table count spanLatency traceError | appendpipe [| stats count as event_count | eval count=0, spanLatency="0", traceError="0" | where event_count=0 | fields - event_count ]

| stats count by spanLatency | search spanLatency=poor | eval traceError="*" | table count spanLatency traceError | appendpipe [| stats count as event_count | eval count=0, spanLatency="0", traceError="0" | where event_count=0 | fields - event_count ]

| stats count by spanLatency | search spanLatency=warning | eval traceError="*" | table count spanLatency traceError | appendpipe [| stats count as event_count | eval count=0, spanLatency="0", traceError="0" | where event_count=0 | fields - event_count ]

| stats count by spanLatency | search spanLatency=good | eval traceError="*" | table count spanLatency traceError | appendpipe [| stats count as event_count | eval count=0, spanLatency="0", traceError="0" | where event_count=0 | fields - event_count ]

index="$traceIndex$" sourcetype="httpevent" | rex field=service.name "(?<service_name>.*)" | search service_name="$serviceName$" | rex field=start_time "(?<start_time>\d+)" | rex field=end_time "(?<end_time>\d+)" | eval start_time=start_time/1000000000 | eval end_time=end_time/1000000000 | eval _time=start_time
| eval duration=(end_time-start_time)*1000 | sort 0 _time | eval spanLatency=case(duration>=$latencyPoor$, "1", duration>=$latencyPoor$, "2", true(), "3") | sort 0 spanLatency _time
| table spanLatency duration trace_id span_id parent_span_id name start_time end_time kind | rename trace_id as traceID | rename span_id as spanID | rename parent_span_id as parentSpanID | rename name as spanName | rename kind as spanKind | rex field=spanName "(?<traceError>(?i)error)" | eval traceError=if(!isnull(traceError), 1, 2) | stats min(spanLatency) as spanLatency, min(traceError) as traceError, max(duration) as duration, count(traceID) as numberOfSpans, values(spanID) as spanID, values(spanName) as spanName, min(start_time) as traceStartTime, max(end_time) as traceEndTime by traceID | eval spanLatency=case(spanLatency=1, "poor", spanLatency=2, "warning", true(), "good") | eval traceStartTime=strftime(traceStartTime, "%Y-%m-%d %H:%M:%S.%6N") | eval traceEndTime=strftime(traceEndTime, "%Y-%m-%d %H:%M:%S.%6N") | eval traceError=if(traceError=1, "error", "good") | stats count by traceError | search traceError="error" | eval spanLatency="*" | table count traceError spanLatency | appendpipe [| stats count as event_count | eval count=0, spanLatency="0", traceError="0" | where event_count=0 | fields - event_count ]

index="$traceIndex$" sourcetype="httpevent" "trace_id"="$traceFind$" | rex field=service.name "(?<service_name>.*)" | search service_name="$serviceName$" | rex field=start_time "(?<start_time>\d+)" | rex field=end_time "(?<end_time>\d+)" | eval start_time=start_time/1000000000 | eval end_time=end_time/1000000000 | eval _time=start_time
| eval duration=(end_time-start_time)*1000 | sort 0 _time | eval spanLatency=case(duration>=$latencyPoor$, "1", duration>=$latencyWarn$, "2", true(), "3") | sort 0 spanLatency _time
| table spanLatency duration trace_id span_id parent_span_id name start_time end_time kind | rename trace_id as traceID | rename span_id as spanID | rename parent_span_id as parentSpanID | rename name as spanName | rename kind as spanKind | rex field=spanName "(?<traceError>(?i)error)" | eval traceError=if(!isnull(traceError), 1, 2) | stats min(spanLatency) as spanLatency, min(traceError) as traceError, max(duration) as duration, count(traceID) as numberOfSpans, values(spanID) as spanID, list(spanName) as spanName, min(start_time) as traceStartTime, max(end_time) as traceEndTime by traceID | eval spanLatency=case(spanLatency=1, "poor", spanLatency=2, "warning", true(), "good") | eval traceStartTime=strftime(traceStartTime, "%Y-%m-%d %H:%M:%S.%6N") | eval traceEndTime=strftime(traceEndTime, "%Y-%m-%d %H:%M:%S.%6N") | eval traceError=if(traceError=1, "error", "good") | search spanLatency="$spanLatencySearch$" traceError="$traceError$"
index="$traceIndex$" sourcetype="httpevent" "trace_id"="$traceIDKPI$" | rex field=service.name "(?<service_name>.*)" | search service_name="$serviceName$" | stats count

index="$traceIndex$" sourcetype="httpevent" "trace_id"="$traceIDKPI$" | rex field=service.name "(?<service_name>.*)" | search service_name="$serviceName$" | rex field=start_time "(?<start_time>\d+)" | rex field=end_time "(?<end_time>\d+)" | eval start_time=start_time/1000000000 | eval end_time=end_time/1000000000 | eval _time=start_time | eval eventStartTime=strftime(start_time, "%Y-%m-%d %H:%M:%S.%6N") | eval eventEndTime=strftime(end_time, "%Y-%m-%d %H:%M:%S.%6N") | eval duration=end_time-start_time | table _time eventStartTime eventEndTime duration trace_id span_id parent_span_id name kind | sort _time | rex field=name "(?<line_label>.*)" | rename parent_span_id as from | rename span_id as to | table from to line_label duration

index="$traceIndex$" sourcetype="httpevent" "trace_id"="$traceIDKPI$" | rex field=service.name "(?<service_name>.*)" | search service_name="$serviceName$" | rex field=start_time "(?<start_time>\d+)" | rex field=end_time "(?<end_time>\d+)" | eval start_time=start_time/1000000000 | eval end_time=end_time/1000000000 | eval _time=start_time
| eval duration=(end_time-start_time)*1000 | sort 0 _time | eval spanLatency=case(duration>=$latencyPoor$, "1", duration>=$latencyWarn$, "2", true(), "3") | sort 0 spanLatency _time
| table spanLatency duration trace_id span_id parent_span_id name start_time end_time kind | rename trace_id as traceID | rename span_id as spanID | rename parent_span_id as parentSpanID | rename name as spanName | rename kind as spanKind | rename duration as spanDuration | table spanID spanDuration | eval poor=$latencyPoor$ | eval warning=$latencyWarn$

table.title: Trace Details - Database + HTTP + Error Information

search.query:
index="$traceIndex$" sourcetype="httpevent" "trace_id"="$traceIDKPI$" | rex field=service.name "(?<service_name>.*)" | search service_name="$serviceName$" | rex field=start_time "(?<start_time>\d+)" | rex field=end_time "(?<end_time>\d+)" | eval start_time=start_time/1000000000 | eval end_time=end_time/1000000000 | eval _time=start_time
| eval duration=(end_time-start_time)*1000 | sort 0 _time | eval spanLatency=case(duration>=$latencyPoor$, "1", duration>=$latencyWarn$, "2", true(), "3") | sort 0 spanLatency _time
| rename trace_id as traceID | rename span_id as spanID | rename parent_span_id as parentSpanID | rename name as spanName | rename kind as spanKind | rex field=spanName "(?<traceError>(?i)error)" | eval traceError=if(!isnull(traceError), 1, 2) | stats values(attributes.*) as * by traceID | transpose 0 | rename column as "trace.db.http.error.metrics" | rename "row 1" as "trace.db.http.error.values"

table.title: Trace Details - Runtime Operating System + Process + Otel Collector Information

search.query:
index="$traceIndex$" sourcetype="httpevent" "trace_id"="$traceIDKPI$" | rex field=service.name "(?<service_name>.*)" | search service_name="$serviceName$" | rex field=start_time "(?<start_time>\d+)" | rex field=end_time "(?<end_time>\d+)" | eval start_time=start_time/1000000000 | eval end_time=end_time/1000000000 | eval _time=start_time
| eval duration=(end_time-start_time)*1000 | sort 0 _time | eval spanLatency=case(duration>=$latencyPoor$, "1", duration>=$latencyWarn$, "2", true(), "3") | sort 0 spanLatency _time
| rename trace_id as traceID | rename span_id as spanID | rename parent_span_id as parentSpanID | rename name as spanName | rename kind as spanKind | rex field=spanName "(?<traceError>(?i)error)" | eval traceError=if(!isnull(traceError), 1, 2) | stats values(fields.*) as * by traceID | transpose 0 | rename column as "trace.os.procs.otel.metrics" | rename "row 1" as "trace.os.procs.otel.values"

index="$traceIndex$" sourcetype="httpevent" "trace_id"="$traceIDKPI$" | rex field=service.name "(?<service_name>.*)" | search service_name="$serviceName$" | rex field=start_time "(?<start_time>\d+)" | rex field=end_time "(?<end_time>\d+)" | eval start_time=start_time/1000000000 | eval end_time=end_time/1000000000 | eval _time=start_time | eval duration=(end_time-start_time)*1000 | sort 0 _time | eval spanLatency=case(duration>=$latencyPoor$, "1", duration>=$latencyWarn$, "2", true(), "3") | sort 0 spanLatency _time | rename trace_id as traceID | rename span_id as spanID | rename parent_span_id as parentSpanID | rename name as spanName | rename kind as spanKind | rex field=spanName "(?<traceError>(?i)error)" | eval traceError=if(!isnull(traceError), 1, 2) | stats values(attributes.*) as * values(events{}.*) as * by traceID, spanID | rex field=timestamp "(?<newtimestamp>\d+)" | eval timestamp=newtimestamp/1000000000 | fields - newtimestamp | eval timestamp=strftime(timestamp, "%Y-%m-%d %H:%M:%S.%6N") | transpose 0 | rename column as "trace.span.metrics" | foreach "row *" [ | rename "<<FIELD>>" AS "span.<<MATCHSTR>>" ]
